overview: A quick, easy-to-learn Qigong routine to detoxify and cleanse the entire system without diet restrictions or supplements. This 45-minute program harnesses Qigong's 13 most potent exercises for flushing out the buildup of environmental and dietary toxins and promotes optimal health and well-being. A complete workout plus step-by-step introduction to the exercises will keep you coming back for more. This workout empowers anyone to proactively take charge of their health and well-being.
title: Gaiam: Qigong for Cleansing
